creator: faizakhtar1@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 35680
testlog

testNowPlusOneDayWithLocale test fails on Ubuntu 16.04.

Steps followed:

sudo apt-get install -y git openjdk-8-jdk ant openssl openjfx
export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64
export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH

git clone git://git.apache.org/jmeter.git
cd jmeter/
git checkout v3_3
ant download_jars
ant
ant test -Djava.awt.headless=true

Attached testlog
